main_definition: An accepted (but deprecated and rarely used) SI unit of area equal to 100 square metres, or a former unit of approximately the same extent. Symbol: a.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An accepted (but deprecated and rarely used) SI unit of area equal to 100 square metres, or a former unit of approximately the same extent. Symbol: a.
meanings_and_examples.example: The old farming land was measured in ares before it became obsolete due to the adoption of metric units.
